name: 24 Hours
description: Each person’s understanding and experience of “24 hours” is different. Schizophrenia is a disorder that begins in childhood as a result of metamorphosis in the brain structures of patients and is often genetically transmitted to generations. By observing this situation over time, looking at the past, I realized the path that led to the exclusion from the difficulties in social life and marginalized. I showed a reflection of the 24 hours of these patients with a video performance.
